short_description: vlas is a legal services company based in lynchburg, virginia, united states.
long_description: it all begins with an idea. maybe you want to launch a business. maybe you want to turn a hobby into something more. or maybe you have a creative project to share with the world. call our intake and get your application started today. 1-866-leglaid (1-866-534-5243). call our intake and get your application started today. 1-866-leglaid or (434) 455-3080. visit online to see if you qualify. virginia legal aid society is dedicated to providing free legal assistance to individuals in need. our goal is to ensure equal access to justice for all. with a commitment to empowering individuals with the legal knowledge they need, we strive to make a positive impact in our community. virginia legal aid society provides free civil (non-criminal) legal assistance to low-income people living in -- or with legal problems in -- the 20 counties and 6 cities served by our offices located in lynchburg, farmville, martinsville, danville, and suffolk. vlas provides legal advice in most areas of civil law and provides legal representation in many areas of civil law.
generated_description: va legal aid, legally known as va legal aid society, based in suffolk, virginia, is dedicated to providing free legal assistance to low-income individuals facing legal challenges. the organization offers legal advice and representation in various areas of civil law, including consumer/debtor's rights, criminal/traffic matters, education law, elder law, employment law, family/domestic violence, health and healthcare, housing, public benefits, and more. va legal aid society operates in 20 counties and 6 cities, including lynchburg, farmville, martinsville, danville, and suffolk. the organization aims to ensure equal access to justice for all, focusing on personal safety, housing, and government benefits.
